doctors.name: Dr. Lenny Steinberg
doctors.relationship: Owes Ursula a favor. Never asks why she pays in cash.

specialists.name: Dr. Nadia Kogan
specialists.relationship: Has a soft spot for Ursula. Knows too much.

administrators.name: Patricia 'Patty' Delvecchio
administrators.relationship: Knows how to make paperwork disappear.
stories: That Time Ursula 'Died' for an Insurance Payout

mechanics.name: Salvatore 'Sal' Giordano
mechanics.relationship: Taught Ursula everything she knows about cars. Like a second father.
stories: The Late-Night Chase Through Back Bay

dealers.name: Benny Calabrese
dealers.relationship: Complicated. Knows where too many bodies are buried.
stories: The Philly Job That Went Sideways

tow_operators.name: Jimmy 'Two Trucks' O'Malley
tow_operators.specialty: Making vehicles vanish from accident scenes
tow_operators.relationship: Cousin's friend. Available 24/7 for the right price.
stories: The Night We Lost a Bentley

accountants.name: Max 'The Closer' Marino
accountants.specialty: Making problems disappear from balance sheets
accountants.relationship: Former Wall Street colleague. Knows where all the money is hidden.

tax_agents.name: Diane Marsh
tax_agents.relationship: Former IRS agent turned 'consultant'. Expensive but worth it.
stories: How I Made the IRS Pay Me Instead

bankers.name: Vincent LaRoche
bankers.relationship: Ex-husband. Hates her but can't say no.
stories: How I Won My Porsche in a Divorce Bet
